{{Wired embedded system |brand=ihiji |model=INV-APP |revision=-2100 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Habey USA |manuf_model=BIS-6628 |type=network monitor |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Celeron |cpu1_model=N2807 |cpu1_cspeed=1.58 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FWSIG |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=ADATA |ram1_model=DDR3L (SODIMM) |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, mSATA, SATA II |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=4 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, 9-pin header,, populated |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8111F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1K Serial FRAM Memory;Farnell;FM94C46A;;1;,,, 5.1 Channel HiDef Audio Codec;Realtek;ALC662;;1;,,, 4-port USB hub controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;2;,,, Environment Control - LPC I/O;ITE Tech Inc;IT8718F;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Texas Instruments;LM358;;3;,,, 1+1 Voltage Regulator for IMVP-7/VR12 CPUs;Intersil;ISL95837;;1;,,, 5V/12V Single Synchronous Buck PWM Controller;Intersil;ISL6545;;2;,,, Dual Synchronous Buck Controller w/ 100mA LDO;uPI Micro;uP6182;;1;,,, 3A 23V Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Micro;uP1707P;;2;,,, 1A Low Dropout P+ Voltage Regulator;Taitron Components;LD1117A;;1;,,, 1.8A Sink/Source Bus Termination Regulator;RichPower;RP1210;;1;,,, 7.5A 30V Dual N-Channel Power MOSFET;OnSemi;NTMD4840N;;3;,,, 11.4A 30V P-Channel Power MOSFET;OnSemi;NTMS4177P;;2;,,, Multiple RS-232 Driver/Receiver;TI;GD72532;;2;,,, 1.5A Inverting Regulator;OnSemi;MC34063A;;1; |flags=HDMI, RTC w/ battery, heat sink, metal case |stock_boot=Grub;0.97; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32-504;Centos 6.6; |oui_eth=24:1C:04 }} {{TagLine|ihiji INV-APP-2100}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Celeron]] N2807 Dual-Core (@1.58GHz) *Memory: 2GB DDR3L (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, :8GB mSATA SSD, 1x SATA port *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 3x USB 2.0 ports *PCI: 1x PCIe w/ USB Support *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
===Models=== *[[Ihiji INV-APP-500]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-750]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-1100]] *[[Ihiji INV-APP-2100]]
